amendment.description: To provide emergency supplemental appropriations for border security and immigration reform.

action.text: Amendment SA 4768 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4768.

Amendment SA 4768 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S8574-8578, S8599; text: CR S8575; text as modified: CR S8577) To provide emergency supplemental appropriations for border security and immigration reform.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4768 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
